title: Project flag
body:
It would be great to have a project flag to specify the:
#SBATCH -A project_id

that is seperate from the very specific uppmax flag. If one does not use the uppmax flag you have to manually replace the None with the appropriate project_id before launching the sbatch scripts.

title: Make the module load commmands optional
body: They are specfic to uppmax. It would be great if one could make the use of them boolean.
